reasoning: Concise and syntactically clear, but naming is non descriptive and harms understanding. Ternary is fine, yet getEspinafre is called twice, which can affect clarity and cost if it has side effects. The condition uses greater than zero instead of not equal to zero, which may be surprising. Local variables and clearer names would improve readability.
